title: Nope, You Don't Need to Rest Cookie Dough | Jessie Sheehan
description:
Referenced in this episode

  • Epic Snickerdoodles for Stephanie Recipe
  • Snackable Bakes: 100 Easy-Peasy Recipes for Exceptionally Scrumptious Sweets and Treats

Genius-Hunter Extra Credit

  • Jessie Sheehan's Instagram

Have a genius recipe you'd like to share? Tell me all about it at genius@food52.com.

Theme Music by The Cabinetmaker on Blue Dot Sessions
author: podcasts@food52.com (Kristen Miglore, Jessie Sheehan)

itunes:title: Nope, You Don't Need to Rest Cookie Dough | Jessie Sheehan
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore, Jessie Sheehan
itunes:summary: Jessie Sheehan's newest book, Snackable Bakes, is full of recipes meant to get you from wanting a sweet treat to your first bite as quickly as possible. On today's episode, Kristen and Jessie talk about some essential baking hacks and dive deep on one particularly snackable bake.
